name: Tropical Rainforest
description: Hot and humid all year round with heavy rainfall

name: Tropical Monsoon
description: Distinct rainy season with a short dry season

name: Tropical Savanna
description: Alternates between a wet season and a dry season

name: Arid Desert
description: Very dry with little to no rainfall

name: Semi-Arid Steppe
description: Prolonged dry seasons with little rainfall

name: Mediterranean
description: Mild, wet winters and hot, dry summers

name: Humid Subtropical
description: Mild winters, hot and humid summers

name: Oceanic
description: Moderate temperatures with year-round rainfall

name: Humid Continental
description: Well-defined seasons with cold winters and hot summers

name: Subarctic
description: Very long, cold winters and short, cool summers

name: Tundra
description: Cold temperatures year-round with little vegetation

name: Ice Cap
description: Extremely cold, permanently covered in ice

name: Alpine
description: Cold climate influenced by altitude

name: Equatorial
description: Hot and humid with little seasonal variation

name: Monsoon
description: Heavy rainfall during the wet season

name: Hot Desert
description: Extreme heat and no rainfall

name: Cold Desert
description: Dry climate with very low winter temperatures

name: Steppe
description: Semi-arid dry seasons with moderate rainfall

name: Savanna
description: Alternates between dry and wet seasons

name: Subpolar Oceanic
description: Cool temperatures year-round with moderate rainfall

name: Polar Tundra
description: Permanently frozen soil, little precipitation

name: Polar Ice Sheet
description: Extreme cold with glaciers and no vegetation

name: Continental Subarctic
description: Very cold and long winters, short mild summers

name: Temperate Continental
description: Temperate climate with well-defined seasons

name: Humid Subarctic
description: Cold and snowy winters, short summers

name: Cold Oceanic
description: Cool temperatures with constant humidity

name: Wet Tropical
description: Heavy rainfall and high humidity year-round

name: Dry Tropical
description: Hot year-round with dry periods

name: Marine West Coast
description: Mild temperatures and constant humidity

name: Boreal
description: Long, very cold winters, short and cool summers

name: Continental Monsoon
description: Cold, dry winters and hot, humid summers

name: Subtropical Highland
description: Moderate temperatures influenced by altitude

name: Desertic Polar
description: Extremely dry and cold year-round

name: Subtropical Arid
description: Extreme heat with very little rainfall

name: Highland Steppe
description: Semi-arid climate influenced by altitude
